lines.text: Funny thing how he always strikes in the rain.
Maybe he likes rain. Must be a fish.
I always wanted to throw something out of that window. Ha, I didn't know it would be me.
Yeah, if he buys his magazines here, he probably lives somewhere nearby.
Well, we'll check the laundries, poolrooms, markets, saloons.
It's a cinch. All we have to do is turn the neighborhood upside down, then shake all the buildings until he falls out of one of them.
